title: GTEx Consortium releases fresh insights into how DNA differences govern gene expression
author: Tom Ulrich
description: Fifteen studies establish a resource & outline outcomes of the consortium's 10-year effort to explain how DNA variants found in large-scale genetic research influence traits and disease
cleaned_text: fresh insights into how DNA differences govern gene expression Fifteen studies establish a resource & outline outcomes of the consortium's 10-year effort to explain how DNA variants found in large-scale genetic research influence traits and disease September 10, 2020
